about_the_game:
This pack includes:

  • "Katrina" hero unlock;
  • "Casual" outfit;
  • "Aviator" sunglasses;
  • 700 Golden Crowns.

Early childhood was spent working in the mines for the extraction of cobalt ore. Even then, workers noticed that the girl was very good at finding rare minerals, and it was all about her unusual ability.
The saying “Like behind a stone wall” literally fits Katrina, because she has an unusual gift - “Bastion”.

Ability: "Bastion"
Creates a stone shield around herself that blocks bullets and reduces damage from explosions for the next 25 seconds. Be careful, the head will remain exposed and you will lose mobility! While the stone shield is active, you can re-activate the ability. This will scatter rock armor around and push back players, grenades and other objects.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.
detailed_description:
This pack includes:

  • "Katrina" hero unlock;
  • "Casual" outfit;
  • "Aviator" sunglasses;
  • 700 Golden Crowns.

Early childhood was spent working in the mines for the extraction of cobalt ore. Even then, workers noticed that the girl was very good at finding rare minerals, and it was all about her unusual ability.
The saying “Like behind a stone wall” literally fits Katrina, because she has an unusual gift - “Bastion”.

Ability: "Bastion"
Creates a stone shield around herself that blocks bullets and reduces damage from explosions for the next 25 seconds. Be careful, the head will remain exposed and you will lose mobility! While the stone shield is active, you can re-activate the ability. This will scatter rock armor around and push back players, grenades and other objects.

Golden Crowns is an in-game currency that can be spent on:

  • Battle Pass which allows you to pass additional challenges and get unique rewards;
  • Unique outfits and gestures in the in-game store;
  • Exchange to Eternal Grace, which is the main currency accepted in the shadow realm, required for obtaining new mystic powers.

Note!

  • Refund is not provided if you purchase 2 different packs which include the same content!
  • Available only for Windows. You can't activate this item for the PSN or Xbox Live account, or the mobile version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
